name: damsa
title: Emcee: Damsa | FlipTop Battle League
reppin: Outright, SundaloniSadam, Vigilante Family, Lloks, Rep The Hood Ent
description: There are only a few emcees in FlipTop who can flawlessly rap fast, and Damsa is one of them. While his debut at Down N South in 2010 was a bit unimpressive, he bounced back at Grain Assault 2 using his trademark flow. 2016 was arguably his greatest year thanks to his consecutive victories. If you want to witness Damsaâ€™s impressive flow in full force, then check out his Gubat 5 clash with Flict-G. He eventually teamed up with his aforementioned opponent at the Dos Por Dos Tournament in 2017, where they were able to reach the semi-finals.
